
                            
                            <p><a href="https://ebsnew.boc.cn/bocphone/VueLocalCli4/popularActivity/index.html#/multiTaskShare?activityId=20250121151933476871&amp;lastShortUrl=DfPVmA7Y5H" target="_blank">注册链接</a> <br> 进入后点右上角新客注册。 <br> 录入身份信息参考图一 <br> 录入自己名下工行，农行，建行，交通银行，邮政银行，任意一个卡号，参考图二 <br> 上传shen/份证照片，人脸识别，参考图三 <br> 选择职业信息，设置密码，参考图四 <br> 卡号生成后截屏，参考图5参加薅羊毛活动。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134229klgro0x8zxjp2pvl.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134229klgro0x8zxjp2pvl.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134241x2tj06vydzd02qtn.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134241x2tj06vydzd02qtn.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134356ztc267tmzjz9a29l.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134356ztc267tmzjz9a29l.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134706gwjsl2a4ayyqcw8l.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134706gwjsl2a4ayyqcw8l.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134825xcddv9ctmzrlzser.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/21/134825xcddv9ctmzrlzser.jpg"> <br>  <br>  <br> </p>
